title: Dynamic Programming Introduction
subject: Algorithms
theory:
DP solves problems by breaking them into overlapping subproblems and storing results to avoid re-computation. 
"Those who cannot remember the past are condemned to repeat it."

interview_questions.question: Properties required for DP?
interview_questions.answer:
1. Optimal Substructure (Optimal solution contains optimal sub-solutions).
2. Overlapping Subproblems.
